name: APOTHEOSIS (Meneer Guus)
description:
In this intense 2D platforming shoot 'em up with bullet hell and roguelite influences you collect mythological artifacts to face powerful gods.
Your hitbox is just one single pixel, so you should be able to dodge hundreds of bullets with relative ease. Just don't stand still in one place.

Since controls are not explained in the game (yet)

Controls can be customized (except for walking), but defaults are

  • A and D - Moving
  • W - (double/triple/etc) jump
  • S - Fast falling
  • Shift - Walk slowly
  • LMB - Shoot
  • RMB - Use a clear/charge (Wipes out bullets around you)

You can also follow the game on Twitter!

https://twitter.com/apotheosisgame
